mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TBL_VOLUNTEER (ID, VOLUNTEER_START_DATE, VOLUNTEER_END_DATE, VOLUNTEER_DEADLINE, COURSE_ID) VALUES (SEQ_VOLUNTEER.NEXTVAL, #{volunteerStartDate}, #{volunteerEndDate}, #{volunteerDeadline}, #{courseId})
mapper.select: SELECT ID, VOLUNTEER_START_DATE, VOLUNTEER_END_DATE, VOLUNTEER_DEADLINE, COURSE_ID, CREATED_DATE, UPDATED_DATE FROM TBL_VOLUNTEER WHERE COURSE_ID = #{courseId}
mapper.update: UPDATE TBL_VOLUNTEER SET VOLUNTEER_START_DATE = #{volunteerStartDate}, VOLUNTEER_END_DATE = #{volunteerEndDate}, VOLUNTEER_DEADLINE = #{volunteerDeadline}, UPDATED_DATE = SYSDATE WHERE COURSE_ID = #{courseId}
